desc: Beyond Words is an independent publisher of books, DVDs, and other products for your mind, body, and spirit. Self help, inspiration, transformation, and more!

layout.text: With more than twenty years of experience as one of Australia’s foremost life coaches, bestselling author Shannah Kennedy describes her approach to living your best life in The Life Plan, a workbook that gives you a collection of simple strategies designed to build your confidence, prioritize your goals, and make your dreams a reality in a changing world.
